title: Google pixel 2 stuck on charging screen, what do I do?
content: Hello! I have a pixel 2, it was working fine until it turned off when i had 22% battery. i rebooted it and it prompted a data may be corrupt screen, i chose the reload option instead of factory reset but my phone turned off and said it was charging. my phone wasnt connected to anything to be charging and its been stuck on the off charge screen since 4:40pm. i tried plugging it in but it wont turn on anymore or turn off. its just stuck on the display.
